title: Episode 360: BET Awards 2022 Part 1
itunes:title: Episode 360: BET Awards 2022 Part 1
description:
The ladies of Lip Service were in LA for the 2022 BET Awards and had the pleasure of interviewing a total of 36 artists over the course of 2 days. In this episode, you will hear a compilation of French Montana, Chloe Bailey, Jussie Smollett, Irv Gotti, Symba, Zavi, Earn Your Leisure, Slim Thug & DreamDoll. For those who don't know, the media room is a very crowded space, with many other media outlets all interviewing tons of artists at once. While things may have gotten hectic from time to time...it's safe to say the ladies and our guests had an absolute blast! Enjoy!

The ladies of Lip Service were in LA for the 2022 BET Awards and had the pleasure of interviewing a total of 36 artists over the course of 2 days. In this episode, you will hear a compilation of French Montana, Chloe Bailey, Jussie Smollett, Irv Gotti, Symba, Zavi, Earn Your Leisure, Slim Thug & DreamDoll. For those who don't know, the media room is a very crowded space, with many other media outlets all interviewing tons of artists at once. While things may have gotten hectic from time to time...it's safe to say the ladies and our guests had an absolute blast! Enjoy!
